config.name: hanabi_qwen3_8b_vs_gemini25_flash
config.description: 2-episode Hanabi eval (Qwen3-8B vs Gemini-2.5-Flash) via OpenRouter (OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

spec.system_prompt: You are an expert Hanabi teammate. Output exactly ONE valid action and nothing else. Valid formats: [Discard] X | [Play] X | [Reveal] player N card X color C | [Reveal] player N card X rank R. If you [Reveal], it must be truthful for that specific card index (color in {white,yellow,green,blue,red} or rank in {1,2,3,4,5}).
